description: Information about the specimen that was extracted from the donor organism.
title: specimen_from_organism

type.description: This should always be a specimen_from_organism

body_part.description: A more detailed position within the body than the term given in the organ field.

donor_id.description: The ID of the donor from which this sample was collected.

organ.description: The organ that the sample came from. e.g. liver, spleen. "Blood" and "connective tissue" count as organs.

state_of_specimen.description: State of body_part at collection and how it was preserved after removal.
